dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 5900 : To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2016 East 1st Street in Los Angeles, California, as the “Marine Corps Reserve PVT Jacob Cruz Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2016 East 1st Street in Los Angeles, California, as the Marine Corps Reserve PVT Jacob Cruz Post Office.

section.header: Marine Corps Reserve PVT Jacob Cruz Post Office

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2016 East 1st Street in Los Angeles, California, shall be known and designated as the Marine Corps Reserve PVT Jacob Cruz Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Marine Corps Reserve PVT Jacob Cruz Post Office.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives May 11, 2022.
